articles.title: Xiaomi's 13 Ultra camera kit is more fun than it should be - The Verge
articles.description: The Xiaomi 13 Ultra’s camera accessory kit adds a two-stage shutter button to an already highly capable smartphone camera, including a one-inch sensor and two telephoto lenses. And as a bonus, it doesn’t make you look like a huge doofus.
articles.content:
Camera grips are back, baby.
